trends: There has been one other sighting in Ferris
There were no other sightings in Ferris on or around October 20th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI went camping and my friend pointed out a cloud that was moving very fast. I thought it was an airplane at first, then decided to contact someone else. We were on a HAM radio at the time and the signal got extremely distorted. We ran to out tents to snap a picture but were too late. It left our field of vision. It scared me. I was a nonbeliever until today, when I was POSITIVE I saw a UFO.
Summary: Outline of triangular shape 500-750 feet long
